Package xcsf

Interface Summary
XCSFListener This interface can be implemented to observe Population and MatchSet changes in XCSF.
 

Class Summary
ClassifierSet Since the methods of Population and MatchSet are most frequently used in xcsf, the implementation is an even more efficient version of a ArrayList (much code is stolen from ArrayList, indeed).
EvolutionaryComp This class encapsulates the evolutionary process of xcsf, i.e.
MatchSet The MatchSet class extends ClassifierSet and encapsulates ClassifierSet methods used for matchset creation, covering and update.
PerformanceEvaluator This class encapsulates all performance related methods and offers methods to write performance files.
Population The Population class extends ClassifierSet and offers deletion and greedy compaction methods.
StateDescriptor Handles the state description for double valued input states.
XCSF The main XCSF class coordinates the learning process and listeners.
XCSFConstants Makes available all kinds of XCSF constants (static).
XCSFUtils Collection of several utilities (e.g.
XCSFUtils.GnuPlotConsole This class is used to communicate with a GnuPlot instance.
XCSFUtils.Random Implementation of a random number generator.
